projects.title: Buddy wants a sled
projects.description: Hey I'm Buddy and I'm broke AF bud, can't even buy a bottle of black label and some CCs. I'm hoping you kind strangers can send me some Loonies so I can go out for a rip this winter
projects.creator: Buddy LeGuy

projects.title: Buddy wants a hottub
projects.description: The missus wants a hottub and I don't have the money for that. Do you?
projects.creator: Buddy LeGuy

projects.title: Buddy wants a Vacation
projects.description: The missus is driving me nuts. I'd like to go to Vegas. Can you be the make-it-happen captain?
projects.creator: Buddy LeGuy
